high_descs: Turn right and walk, turn left and walk towards the coffee table.
Pick up the banana from the plate, on the table.
Turn back and walk towards the floor lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the banana by the light of the tall floor lamp.

high_descs:
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the coffee table 
pick up the banana from the coffee table
turn right and walk to the floor  lamp in the corner.
turn on the floor lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a banana by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, go towards the fridge and then go to the coffee table to your right.
Pick up the banana from the plate on the coffee table.
Go towards the microwave on your left and then go straight to the floor lamp on your left.
anns.task_desc: Examine a banana by the light of a floor lamp.
